tool.name: demo3D00
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D00 synthesizes one 3D image with nuclear, cell shape, and nucleolar channels from nucleolar model with sampling method set to render nucleoli as ellipsoids without convolution. The model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset.
**Input**
- Seed for Pseudo-Random Number Generator - Image Compression Algorithm
**Output**
- A zip file with three TIFF (.tif) files (nuclear, cell shape, and nucleolar channels)
